=== Stable Release Updates ===

** Recent
*** Lucid shipped on 12/20 ( tracked:  http://launchpad.net/bugs/683425 ) 
*** Maverick shipped on 12/20 ( tracked: http://launchpad.net/bugs/683422 ) 

** Next 
*** -ec2 pending testing
*** Karmic - validation in progress,  in general, karmic and earlier don't follow 2 week cadence and will rely on traditional community testing/burn in cycle unless resources available from testing teams. 
*** 1/6 - will be skipped, nothing in queue over holidays - probably should take this into account on future scheduling. 
*** Lucid - 1/27
*** Maverick - 1/27
*** Security - ??  not aware of any hot issues to force earlier at this point.
